bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: American writer, 1888-1944, known for historical novels, particularly Drums, Bitter Creek, and Roll River.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of originals for four letters that appear only as transcripts in the Papers of James Boyd, 7684. They are James Boyd to Frank Stone, 1938 December 15; James Boyd to Frank Stone, 1938 December 28; Frank Stone to James Boyd, 1939 March 21; and James Boyd to Frank Stone, 1939 April 23.
